title: Base Spawning Bug
body:
I played an normal game with Jarvan IV and 3 teammates.
The game started normally and I bought my jungle Items and instantly clicked to the enemy nexus.
I glitched out of the fountain and could run to the nexus without being able to change my route (the weird clicking in the video).
When I should normally be allowed to the left the fountain I was able to change my route again.
Greetings
Tom
(Ingame CoN RadAdenauer)

replies.body: tom lol tom läufst du da grade wirklich lang xD ich hatte das beim alten sr schonmal und da konnte ich die route net ändern und musste reconnecten nachdem ich einmal gestorben bin
